EmailTemplate.name: CSC Email Receipt EBSH Diamonds
EmailTemplate.subject: Case #{!Case.CaseNumber}: {!Case.Subject} : {!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Email_Sender_Name__c} Thank you for your email. This is an automated acknowledgement confirming receipt of your request which will be attended to shortly.
Operating hours: This e-mail service will be available Monday to Friday 08:00 - 16:30.
The Electronic Banking Service Helpdesk will be available Monday to Friday 07:30 - 17:00 and Saturdays 07:30 to 10:30.
Thank you
Electronic Banking Service Helpdesk Local: 0861 000 725/722/724 or 0860 227 232 International: +27(0)113 354 009/010
Important information
Digital certificate renewal
Please use the link below to request your digital certificate. https://bio.lawtrust.co.za/clientca.absa/
Downloading digital certificate
Please use the link below to download your digital certificate.
Please ensure that youâ€™ve received the authorisation code and reference code to successfully download your digital certificate. https://enroll.lawtrust.co.za/absaBIO/
Additional information
For password reset queries, please direct your email to Passwords@absa.co.za For billing-related queries, please direct your request to EBSLimitsbilling@absa.co.za For amendment-related queries, please direct your request to CSCDocumentation@absa.co.za For registration queries, please direct your request to EBSNewregistration@absa.co.za For recall queries, please direct your request to Onlinerecalls@absa.co.za For debit and credit-related queries, please direct your request to Magtapes@absa.co.za
Attached documents
Please find attached the documents reflecting the various cut-off times for Business Integrator Online and Business Integrator Mailbox.
Please find attached the Self-service Password User Guide to reset your Business Integrator Online channel.
Please also find the Password Reset Form if you require assistance in resetting your Electronic Banking Channel password.
